Name: MouseWars
About the game: MouseWars is a real time multiplayer cursor war game. The cursors have to fight until only one remains. Features: Play online with your friends or practice with bots Play an exclusive offline, local multiplayer mode by plugging multiple USB mice, or gamepads Two game modes: All vs all and Team vs team Two score types: Deathmatch and Survival 9 types of attacks Up to 8 players per room In-game chat Servers for South America , North America and Europe
Meta Description: Looking for information on MouseWars? Check out the release date (Dec 5, 2019), developer insights from [r]labs, and a complete game summary.
